author: Faux Fire
comment: Needs more interactivity, restricted to a single "bottom" center widget when i have been using Master by the same dev. I like the look of this but not the functionality. I like having heart rate, weather and step counter all on the watch face at the same time. this one Makes you choose just one (and not easily mind you) at a time.

author: Matt Stellato
comment: Can't change the background. Can't disable the analog indicators and marks. Other than those few things, it's great!

author: Travis Stephens
comment: Great developer. This face is really nice and simple for when you need to see the time often and quick. The big text makes it easy and fast to read.

author: James McG
comment: Simple but useful. You can make a Sci fi like watchface or just a simple one.
title: Nice and customisable

author: Erich Andersen
comment: Simple and sharp. I like it.
title: Sleek.

author: Isreal Mathew
comment: This is a good looking watch face. Very happy with the purchase. Batteries, weather and clock presented together nicely. A new favourite.
title: Nice looking and practical

author: Richard Bown
comment: Good looking, easy on my lg urbane battery this is one of my favourite watchfaces, would highly recommend
title: Great addition to my watchfaces collection

author: Nicholas Vettese
comment: The only thing I would like to see is having the cards removed from view when the watch is dimmed
title: Love it

author: Danny Vanco
comment: I would give if 5 stars if there was an option to run a more minimal always on mode with just the time and date. All the other stuff isn't needed all the time and just wastes battery and causes more burn in. Also needs the option to tap the weather widget and get more detailed information instead of cycling. Please consider adding these features, especially the minimal always on mode.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: I just released an update dedicated to interactivity: shortcuts are now available for the widget, and you can get detailed data on touch when using a data widget. You should get it soon, depending on Google's deployment duration. EDIT: Did you get the update?

title: Looks great but lacks functionality and customization

author: Victor Alvarez
comment: Great watch face. Only problem is that I can't set an area for the weather. If I could set a zip code for my area instead of relying on location and GPS that would be awesome. Other than that no problem!
title: Nice!!

comment: In the very short time I've had my 360, this has become one of my favorite watch faces.  It's simple, clean, and has lots of notification options.  Really love the phone and watch battery monitors on the sides.  It also seems to be really easy on the battery.  I take my watch off the charger at 7am (weekdays) and usually around 5pm I'm at about 50% battery on a "normal use" day.  I've noticed that using this face I'm around 60-65+% battery at that time of day.

author: Ryan Utara
comment: Looks good.  Could use the ability to open Android weather when clicking on the weather icon, not just scrolling through other info.  Also, could use some nice presets for color combos like in the pictures.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: I just released an update dedicated to interactivity: shortcuts are now available for the widget, and you can get detailed data on touch when using a data widget. You should get it soon, depending on Google's deployment duration.

author: Joel Ballew
comment: Phenomenal face. I've been struggling trying to find one and finally picked this one up! I would HIGHLY rate it.
title: Great!

author: Manny Ramirez
comment: Mesh won't work on moto g1

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi can you give me more details about your issue? You can not see the watch face ? Please send me an email, I am sure I can help you fix your problem! EDIT: Did you manage to solve your issue? I did not get any email

title: Mesh not working

author: Dave Petrie
comment: Good looks, nice customizations.  I like that it's configured via the Android wear app..
title: Well designed..

author: Richard Servello
comment: Latest update is making my watch die halfway thru the day, when I used to have 60% left after a long day.  I disabled the new interactive features and it helped for a day, but now it's back to being dead fast.  Switched to a default watchface to be sure that's the cause and now I'm back to normal.  Is there a way to downgrade??  If so I'll give 5 ★s.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. I did the test and I ran a full day and even more. May be was it a local issue, did you try to reboot your watch device? What are the settings you use (dial data, animations, screen on duration, ambient mode?)

title: Was great
